body.p: Hamilton Co State of Ohio. S.S.

John F. Hildreth being first duly sworn says that having been appointed and commissioned by the Governor of Kentucky and commissioner to take affidavits, depositions and the acknowledgement of deeds to be used in the State of Kentucky that he will "well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his said office as required by the State of Kentucky." & further saith not.

I certify that the above named John F Hildreth, was sworn by and to the truth of the above affidavit, this 14' day of October Anno Domini 1863, a copy of which has been entered upon his commission -- witness my hand & seal

Bellamy Stover
Judge 7th Superior Court
of Ohio Circuit Ham. Co
Ohio

By your request I forward this to you E. L. Vanwinkle Sec of State J. F. H.
Ohio
Oath of
J. F. Hildreth
Commr of Deeds
63
